title: ［突發］狗短時間會進入港鐵葵芳站！！

replies.msg:
【警方將進入港鐵葵芳站回應港鐵的報案】

大批示威者目前仍然在港鐵葵芳站內聚集，他們在站內塗鴉及毀壞設施，破壞公眾安寧，威脅在場人士，包括記者和港鐵職員的人身安全。

因應港鐵的報案，警方將會在短時間內進入港鐵葵芳站協助港鐵處理事件。

A large group of protestors are currently gathering inside the Kwai Fong MTR station. They have sprayed paint and caused damages to the facilities therein. Such acts disturb the public peace and threaten the safety of the citizens, including reporters and MTR staff members, on the scene.

In response to a report made by the MTRC, Police officers will soon enter the station to assist MTRC to handle the case.
